pros: Beginning of the semester is busy so time goes by fast
cons: After the 3 weeks work is really slow. Some of the student are rude.

job_title: Anonymous Employee in Little Rock, AR
pros: The best part of working at PSC (and most HCBUs) is the family atmosphere. The camaraderie with coworkers and the opportunities for collaboration.
cons: Staff is stretched very thin and turnover is high in key departments and areas.

job_title: Financial Aid Counselor in Little Rock, AR
pros: Family oriented organization, colleagues are best and worst part of job. Students and. family can be difficult
cons: colleagues are best and worst part of job. Communication from leadership can be confusing and unclear.
